content:
ISecurableChannel Interface

Definition

The ISecurableChannel contains one property, stem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel.IsSecured*, which gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current channel is secure.

In this Article

public interface ISecurableChannel

Properties

IsSecured

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current channel is secure.

public bool IsSecured { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that indicates whether the current channel is secure.

Attributes
get: System.Security.SecurityCritical set: System.Security.SecurityCritical
